VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc ChirpNet?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc ChirpNet is arc {FlickFlare}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc VidVault?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc VidVault is arc {StreamSphere}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?

VE.Q: What is the flow value from ChirpNet to GameCast in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from FlickFlare to GameCast in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between VidVault and FlickFlare in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between VidVault and FlickFlare is {73}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between VidVault and StreamSphere in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between VidVault and StreamSphere is {192}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from VidVault?
SC.A: The total flow output from VidVault is {249}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by GameCast?
SC.A: The total flow input by GameCast is {434}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 180? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {199} from {StreamSphere} to {VidVault}, a flow of {192} from {VidVault} to {StreamSphere}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 80? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {73} from {FlickFlare} to {VidVault}, a flow of {57} from {VidVault} to {FlickFlare}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 117 and 131? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {121} from {FlickFlare} to {GameCast}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from GameCast to StreamSphere or from StreamSphere to FlickFlare?
NC.A: The flow from {GameCast} to {StreamSphere} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from StreamSphere to VidVault, from FlickFlare to VidVault, or from GameCast to ChirpNet?
NC.A: The flow from {StreamSphere} to {VidVault} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {FlickFlare}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {StreamSphere} and {VidVault}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc StreamSphere, Arc VidVault, Arc GameCast, Arc FlickFlare, Arc ChirpNet}.
